column4: Anyone got a second to help me out with an ubuntu-server problem?
Okay, I work for a Web Development company, and we have 2 servers running linux
Just recently, the servers started displaying apostrophes as a black diamond with a white question mark in it
We've never had this problem before, and these websites have been running for months with no changes
Just recently, the servers started displaying apostrophes as a black diamond with a white question mark in it
We've never had this problem before, and these websites have been running for months with no changes
The sites are using charset UTF-8 as they always have been. I don't know why this problem all of a sudden?
An example of it's doing can be viewed here, http://www.mediathoroughbredgroup.com/blog/index.php/category/horse-racing-trivia/
i'd guess that the problem is someone edited the pages and saved them as iso-8859-1
I do most of the coding here, and I know that I always hardcode UTF-8 and XHTML 1.0 Strict
what dou you mean by "hardcode"?
I specifically input to use charset UTF-8 and specify that document type to XHTML 1.0 Strict with the W3C link...
does notepad save as utf8?
you don't seem to understand what i mean. Notepad doesn't offer you the possibility to encode the file you're saving as utf-8, only iso8859-1
some of these sites are also programed in dreamweaver, not using the visual, visual tab is a BIG NO NO here, we always use the coding tab...
and these sites as well have this problem
well then dreamweaver might also be encoding the pages as latin1?
you should probably ask the hosting company then. :)
umm what information? You have a problem with their servers all of a sudden not showing your pages like they should. Ofcourse you should get help, or otherwise your hosting company isn't worrth much.

lol no no, ok we have servers here that we use for offering hosting to our clients... because we do web development. our servers have the issue, when i moved one of our sites to my personal server that i have through another hosting company for my personal portfolio, the problem was solved. i don't know what they are doing that we aren't...
